cellLineName.description: The cell line name as found in the Cell Line Ontology. Must be a child term of 'immortal cell line cell'.
cellLineName.title: Name

cellLineLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the  batch of cells used in the experiment.
cellLineLabBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

cellLineTissue.description: Tissue from which the cell line was derived, with name chosen from NCI Thesaurus, Brenda Tissue Ontology, or UBERON. Must be a child term of 'Tissue (NCIT)', 'tissues, cell types, and enzyme sources (BTO), or tissue (UBERON)'.
cellLineTissue.title: Tissue of Origin

cellLineOrgan.description: Organ from which the cell line was derived, with name chosen from NCI Thesaurus, UBERON, or FMA. Must be a child term of 'organ'.
cellLineOrgan.title: Organ of Origin

cellLineSpecies.description: Species from which the cell line was derived, with name chosen from the NCBI Taxonomy. Must be a child term of 'cellular organisms'.
cellLineSpecies.title: Species of Origin

cellLineDisease.description: If the cell line came from a diseased tissue, the disease name must be taken from the Disease Ontology. Must be a child term of 'disease'. Leave blank if the origin tissue or cells were not diseased.
cellLineDisease.title: Disease

crisprKnockoutName.description: The primary name of the CRISPR reagent.
crisprKnockoutName.title: Name

crisprKnockoutLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the batch of CRISPR reagent used in the experiment.
crisprKnockoutLabBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

crisprKnockoutTargetGeneSymbol.description: The HGNC (human), MGI (mouse), RGD (rat), or ZFIN (zebrafish) symbol of the gene knocked out by CRISPR for knockout, or VGNC gene symbols for other vertebrate species.
crisprKnockoutTargetGeneSymbol.title: Target Gene Symbol

crisprKnockoutTargetGeneId.description: The NCBI Entrez Gene ID for the gene knocked out by CRISPR.
crisprKnockoutTargetGeneId.title: NCBI Entrez ID for Target Gene

crisprKnockoutTargetGeneSpecies.description: The species of the target locus, with name chosen from the NCBI Taxonomy. Must be a child term of 'cellular organisms'.
crisprKnockoutTargetGeneSpecies.title: Target Gene Species

crisprKnockoutDuration.description: Amount of time the model system was exposed to the CRISPR reagent.
crisprKnockoutDuration.title: Duration

crisprKnockoutDurationUnits.description: Time units of exposure (e.g. second, minute, hour). Name of unit must be chosen from the Units of Measurement Ontology (UO) and must be a child term of 'time unit'.
crisprKnockoutDurationUnits.title: Duration Units

species.description: Species from which the sample material was extracted, with name chosen from the NCBI Taxonomy. Must be a child term of 'cellular organisms'.
species.title: Species

gender.description: The self-identified gender of the donor in case of a human, the biological sex in case of a non-human donor.
gender.title: Gender

primaryRace.description: The primary race indicated by a human donor.
primaryRace.title: Primary Race

strain.description: The strain or breed of the model organism in case of a non-human donor.
strain.title: Strain/Breed

ethnicity.description: The ethnic group of origin of a human donor.
ethnicity.title: Ethnicity

dateOfBirth.description: The date of the donor's birth.
dateOfBirth.title: Date of Birth

age.description: The donor's age at the time of collection of the sample. Age units will be specified in the next field.
age.title: Age

ageUnits.description: The units of time in which the age is recorded.
ageUnits.title: Age Units

ageGroup.description: The age group of the donor.
ageGroup.title: Age Group

intervalDeath.description: The number of days between the donor's date of birth and date of death. Report the time units in the Age Units field.
intervalDeath.title: Interval of Death

tobaccoSmokingHistory.description: In the case of a human, the donor's self-reported smoking history. True if the patient has ever smoked.
tobaccoSmokingHistory.title: Tobacco Smoking History

tobaccoSmokingStatus.description: In the case of a human, the status of the donor as a smoker or non-smoker at the time the sample was collected.
tobaccoSmokingStatus.title: Tobacco Smoking Status

icd10Code.description: In the case of a human donor that is diseased, the ICD-10 code for the diagnosis associated with the sample material coming from pathology reports and chart reviews, if the sample itself is diseased, or the relevant diagnosis code for the patient if the sample material itself is healthy (e.g. normal tissue from a cancer patient).
icd10Code.title: ICD10 Code

icd10Description.description: In the case of a human donor that is diseased, the ICD-10 code description for the diagnosis associated with the sample material coming from pathology reports and chart reviews, if the sample itself is diseased, or the relevant diagnosis code description for the patient if the sample material itself is healthy (e.g. normal tissue from a cancer patient).
icd10Description.title: ICD10 Description

pathologicDiagnosis.description: In the case of a human donor who is diseased, pathologic diagnosis recorded by the provider or researcher relevant to the study or sample material. In the case of a non-human donor that is diseased, name of the disease.
pathologicDiagnosis.title: Pathologic Diagnosis

primaryCellName.description: Name of the type of cells, with the name chosen from the Cell Ontology (CL). Must be a child term of 'cell'.
primaryCellName.title: Name

primaryCellLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the  batch of cells used in the experiment
primaryCellLabBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

primaryCellTissue.description: Tissue from which the cells were extracted, with name chosen from NCI Thesaurus, Brenda Tissue Ontology, or UBERON. Must be a child term of 'Tissue (NCIT)', 'tissues, cell types, and enzyme sources (BTO), or tissue (UBERON)'.
primaryCellTissue.title: Tissue of Origin

primaryCellOrgan.description: Organ from which the cells were extracted, with name chosen from NCI Thesaurus, UBERON, or FMA. Must be a child term of 'organ'.
primaryCellOrgan.title: Organ of Origin

primaryCellDisease.description: If the cells are diseased, the disease name must be taken from the Disease Ontology. Must be a child term of 'disease'. Leave blank if the cells were not diseased when obtained from the donor.
primaryCellDisease.title: Disease

primaryCellDonorInformation.description: Information about the human or non-human donor from which the sample material was taken.
primaryCellDonorInformation.title: Donor Information

proteinName.description: The primary name of the protein.
proteinName.title: Name

proteinLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the batch of protein used in the experiment.
proteinLabBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

proteinUniProtId.description: The UniProt ID of the specific protein and, if relevant, isoform.
proteinUniProtId.title: UniProt ID

proteinConcentration.description: Concentration of protein that the model system was exposed to.
proteinConcentration.title: Concentration

proteinConcentrationUnits.description: Concentration units of exposure (e.g. nanomolar, micromolar, millimolar). Name of unit must be chosen from the Experimental Factor Ontology (EFO) or the Units of Measurement Ontology (UO) and must be a child term of 'concentration unit'.
proteinConcentrationUnits.title: Concentration Units

proteinDuration.description: Amount of time the model system was exposed to the protein.
proteinDuration.title: Duration

proteinDurationUnits.description: Time units of exposure (e.g. second, minute, hour). Name of unit must be chosen from the Units of Measurement Ontology (UO) and must be a child term of 'time unit'.
proteinDurationUnits.title: Duration Units

smallMoleculeName.description: The common, primary, recognizable name for the small molecule being used.
smallMoleculeName.title: Small Molecule Name

smallMoleculeLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the batch of small molecule used in the experiment.
smallMoleculeLabBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

smallMoleculeConcentration.description: Concentration of small molecule the model system was exposed to.
smallMoleculeConcentration.title: Concentration

smallMoleculeConcentrationUnits.description: Concentration units of exposure (e.g. nanomolar, micromolar, millimolar). Name of unit must be chosen from the Experimental Factor Ontology (EFO) or the Units of Measurement Ontology (UO) and must be a child term of 'concentration unit'.
smallMoleculeConcentrationUnits.title: Concentration Units

smallMoleculeDuration.description: Amount of time the model system was exposed to the small molecule.
smallMoleculeDuration.title: Duration

smallMoleculeDurationUnits.description: Time units of exposure (e.g. second, minute, hour). Name of unit must be chosen from the Units of Measurement Ontology (UO) and must be a child term of 'time unit'.
smallMoleculeDurationUnits.title: Duration Units

transactivatorVectorName.description: The name of the vector/plasmid containing the gene for the tetracycline transactivator protein.
transactivatorVectorName.title: Transactivator Vector Name

transactivatorProteinName.description: The name of the specific transactivator protein encoded by the vector, e.g. tTA, rtTA, rtTA2, etc.
transactivatorProteinName.title: Transactivator Protein Name

transactivatorVectorLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the batch of transactivator vector.
transactivatorVectorLabBatchLabel.title: Transactivator Vector Lab Batch Label

responseVectorName.description: The name of the vector/plasmid containing the gene(s) under control of the tetracycline response element (TRE).
responseVectorName.title: Response Vector Name

responseVectorGeneOfInterest.description: The gene being regulated under the Tet system.
responseVectorGeneOfInterest.title: Response Vector Gene of Interest

responseVectorReporterGene.description: If present, the reporter gene used to monitor expression.
responseVectorReporterGene.title: Response Vector Reporter Gene

responseVectorPromoter.description: The type of promoter making up the TRE in the response vector.
responseVectorPromoter.title: Response Vector Promoter

responseVectorLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the batch of response vector.
responseVectorLabBatchLabel.title: Response Vector Lab Batch Label

tetLabName.description: Name of the lab running the experiment.
tetLabName.title: Lab Name

doxLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the batch of doxycycine used in the experiment.
doxLabBatchLabel.title: Doxycycline Lab Batch Label

doxConcentration.description: Concentration of doxycycline the model system was incubated with.
doxConcentration.title: Doxycycline Concentration

doxConcentrationUnits.description: Concentration units of incubation with doxycycline.
doxConcentrationUnits.title: Doxycycline Concentration Units

doxDurationUnits.description: Time units of incubation with doxycycline.
doxDurationUnits.title: Doxycycline Incubation Time Units

transfectionTransductionMethod.description: Method used for introducing the Tet expression system (e.g. lipofection, electroporation, viral transduction.
transfectionTransductionMethod.title: Transfection/Transduction Method

transfectionTransductionReagent.description: Specific transfection reagent or virus used (e.g. lipofectamine, lentivirus, adenovirus.
transfectionTransductionReagent.title: Transfection/Transduction Reagent

tissueOrgan.description: The organ in which the tissue was located.
tissueOrgan.title: Organ of Origin

tissueDisease.description: If the tissue was diseased, the disease name must be taken from the Disease Ontology. Must be a child term of 'disease'. Leave blank if the tissue was not diseased when obtained from the donor.
tissueDisease.title: Disease

tissueDonorInformation.description: Information about the human or non-human donor from which the sample material was taken.
tissueDonorInformation.title: Donor Information

tumorType.description: The type of cancer or benign tumor, preferably using OncoTree terminology.
tumorType.title: Tumor Type

resectionSite.description: The anatomical, organ, and/or tissue location where the resection for the tumor sample was performed.
resectionSite.title: Resection Site

tumorSpecimenOrigin.description: The type of biopsy performed for specimen collection: tissue or liquid.
tumorSpecimenOrigin.title: Specimen Origin

tumorSampleType.description: The tumor sample's type based on its location: primary site, site of local recurrence, or distant metastasis.
tumorSampleType.title: Sample Type

tumorOrgan.description: The organ in which the tumor originated.
tumorOrgan.title: Organ of Origin

tumorTissue.description: The tissue type in which the tumor originated.
tumorTissue.title: Tissue of Origin

tumorCellType.description: The type of cell from which the tumor originated.
tumorCellType.title: Cell Type of Origin

tumorPrimaryDiseaseSite.description: Diagnosis site granular grouper for standarization.
tumorPrimaryDiseaseSite.title: Primary Disease Site

tumorSampleDonorInformation.description: Information about the human or non-human donor from which the sample material was taken.
tumorSampleDonorInformation.title: Donor Information

name.description: Please provide a unique name for the sample.
name.title: Sample Name

description.description: Please include a description or any other helpful comments or annotations for the sample.
description.title: Sample Description
